title: Prominent Crypto Trader Foresees Bitcoin’s Surge, Highlights Critical Resistance Level at $28,000
description: DonAlt, who is a popular pseudonymous cryptocurrency trader, has recently expressed optimism about Bitcoin’s potential for a significant upward movement. DonAlt, who has a following of over 508,000 people on a social media platform, believes that Bitcoin is on the verge of breaking a critical resistance level at $28,000. If Bitcoin successfully surpasses this resistance, […]

title: 3 Ways How Bitcoin is Incentivizing Renewable Energy
description:
Critics argue that the energy-intensive process of mining Bitcoin contributes to carbon emissions and exacerbates climate change. However, there is another side to the story. Bitcoin is increasingly being used as a catalyst for the adoption of renewable energy sources worldwide. In this article, we will explore how Bitcoin is incentivizing renewable energy, providing examples […]

The post 3 Ways How Bitcoin is Incentivizing Renewable Energy appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: ETH Governance is Effectively Highly Centralized: Researcher
description:
The founder and CIO of Cyber Capital, Justin Bons, has criticized the ETH governance for being highly centralized. According to Bons, controls in the ETH chain are exerted through the software clients without checks or balances. Bons expressed his opinion about the chain in a recent thread on X (formerly Twitter), where he noted that […]

The post ETH Governance is Effectively Highly Centralized: Researcher appeared first on Coin Edition.
